Description_lang: Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by $s2% while under the effects of Combustion.$?a450716[Your chance of gaining Lit Fuse is increased by $s1% while under the effects of Combustion.][]

description_blz.en_US: Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by 30% while under the effects of Combustion.
description_blz.es_MX: Lanzar Combustión otorga Mecha encendida y el daño de Bomba viva aumenta un 30% mientras estás bajo los efectos de Combustión.
description_blz.pt_BR: Lançar Combustão concede Pavio Aceso e o dano da Bomba Viva aumenta em 30% durante os efeitos de Combustão.
description_blz.de_DE: Der Einsatz von 'Einäschern' gewährt 'Gezündete Lunte', und der Schaden von 'Lebende Bombe' ist um 30% erhöht, solange der Effekt von 'Einäschern' wirkt.
description_blz.en_GB: Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by 30% while under the effects of Combustion.
description_blz.es_ES: Al lanzar Combustión, el daño de Encender mecha y Bomba viva aumenta un 30% mientras estás bajo los efectos de Combustión.
description_blz.fr_FR: Le lancement de Combustion vous confère Mèche allumée et augmente les dégâts de Bombe vivante de 30 % tant que vous êtes sous l’effet de Combustion.
description_blz.it_IT: Lanciare Combustione fornisce Miccia Accesa. Aumenta i danni inflitti da Bomba Vivente del 30% quando Combustione è attiva.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Возгорание" дает вам эффект "Горящий фитиль" и увеличивает урон от "Живой бомбы" на 30%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 발화 시전 시 불붙은 도화선이 부여되고 발화의 효과를 받는 동안 살아있는 폭탄의 공격력이 30%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 施放燃灼時，會賦予點燃引信，且受燃灼的效果影響時，活體爆彈的傷害提高30%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 施放燃烧会获得点燃导火索，并且受到点燃影响时，活动炸弹的伤害提高30%。
